tool.name: jinaReadUrl
tool.description: Reads content from a webpage using r.jina.ai reader service. Optimized for clean, readable content extraction. The response from r.jina.ai/<url> is pure markdown, making it easy to extract and parse.
tool.usage: Use when you need to extract clean, readable content from web pages, especially useful for book details on Goodreads and similar sites. Note: r.jina.ai/<url> returns pure markdown.

parameters.parameter: The URL to read and extract content from. Can be a direct URL or a r.jina.ai URL.
